welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bandung, Indonesia! Known for its cool climate, vibrant arts scene, and stunning colonial architecture, we invite you to explore and enjoy the charm of this beautiful city.

restaurants.name: Kartika Sari
restaurants.description: Kartika Sari is a bakery located in Bandung.
restaurants.address: Jl. Kebon Jukut No. 3C, Bandung, Jawa Barat

restaurants.name: Braga Permai - Maison Bogerijen
restaurants.description: Braga Permai - Maison Bogerijen is a eastern european restaurant located in Bandung.
restaurants.address: Jl. Braga No. 58, Bandung, Jawa Barat

restaurants.name: Baso So'un & Mie Ayam Lodaya
restaurants.description: Baso So'un & Mie Ayam Lodaya is a indonesian meatball restaurant located in Bandung.

restaurants.name: Ayam Goreng SuniaRatu
restaurants.description: Ayam Goreng SuniaRatu is a asian restaurant located in Bandung.
restaurants.address: Jl. Pecinan Lama (Pasar Baru), Bandung, Jawa Barat

restaurants.name: Tanggo Pork Resto
restaurants.description: Tanggo Pork Resto is a indonesian restaurant located in Bandung.
restaurants.address: Jalan Taman Cibunut Utara No. 14, Bandung, Jawa Barat

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
